thread.section_title: Wolfpack Graphic Printing Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wolfpack Graphic Printing | wolfpackprinting.com
thread.title: Kristine Barron
thread.title_full: Wolfpack Graphic Printing reviewed by Kristine Barron

author: Kristine Barron
title: Kristine Barron
text:
Our office was in a hurry to get T-Shirts made for an event. Our normal distributor wasnt able to meet our needs so I started calling around locally. I found Rob at Wolfpack and sent him our design. He was great, he assured me that everything would be ok and he was correct. We received our shirts on time and they were perfect. Thank you Rob for your patience with us.
I would recommend Wolfpack 100%.
